question: Posted By Robert on October 11, 1998 at 02:04:11:I have Ischemic Cardiomyopathy, Diabetes, among others.  I recently found out my triglycerides were 360 and was told by my family doctor to lose weight (I have lost quite a bit of weight already and weigh what I did in Jr. High) and exercise more.  I was told by my cardiologist NOT to exercise as my ejection fraction rate is 20% and exercise is not be recommended.  How do I get my triglycerides down?
title: Cardiomyopathy & Triglycerides
